data.actual_result: When you change the screen mode (portrait/landscape) the roles list disappear
data.short_description: Roles list disappear when switching from landscape mode to portrait mode (or vice versa) on the create a category/channel screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you're admin/owner and create a few roles  - Try to create a new category or a new channel - On the creation screen, press the "Private category/channel" button (enable the option) - Switch your device from landscape mode to portrait mode or vice versa - Observe: the roles list to that you can restrict the channel is gone
